revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: Machumetis Saracenorum principis eiuśque successorum vitae, ac doctrina, ipséque Alcoran, quo velut authentico legum diuinarum codice Agareni & Turcae...[Koran, La..."
revision.text: Possibly: Machumetis Saracenorum principis eiuśque successorum vitae, ac doctrina, ipséque Alcoran, quo velut authentico legum diuinarum codice Agareni & Turcae...[Koran, Latin]. ([Basileae : N. Brylinger, 1543]) http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b1440252~S1
